description.narrative: This is an income generating project aimed at purchasing 1000 broiler birds. It will promote entrepreneurship skills to disabled persons as well as create employment opportunities. The project will involve day to day observation methods of rearing the broi lers through feeding them and giving them the necessary medication. Some members of the group have already been trained in poultry management and they will in turn train the others during the implementation of the project. The training will be practical, l earning by doing. The group already has a poultry house which they will use for the project. The market for the poultry is available. The group has projected that they can make a profit of about ?1250 from the 1000 birds. The profit will be used for purcha sing more chicks and stock feed as well as to meet the day to day running costs. The group has elaborated clearly on the procedure of taking care of a poultry house and chickens in the application. They have also provided quotations for the items to be pur chased.
